title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.14 - Hot surfaces
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.14 - Hot surfaces

State Regulations

Surfaces of a machine which in normal operation may become
heated to a temperature of 150 degrees Fahrenheit or more shall be so located
or covered that they are not normally exposed to contact. This general
requirement does not apply to machine surfaces necessarily heated and exposed
for performance of the designed process, but no such surface shall be heated to
a temperature greater than 360 degrees Fahrenheit nor exposed to an unnecessary
extent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
